Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class LeaderCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.LeaderCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
LeaderDepot, LeaderDiscount, LeaderMarble, LeaderProduction
public abstract class LeaderCard
extends java.lang.Object
this class represent the abstract leader card

    • abilityMarble

      public void abilityMarble​(java.util.Map<Marble,​java.lang.Integer> temporaryMapMarble, int numOfTransformation) throws NotEnoughWhiteMarblesException, InvalidLeaderAction
      Method to use the marble ability of the card
      Parameters:
      temporaryMapMarble - the map that contains the marbles to transform
      numOfTransformation - the number of marbles to transform
      Throws:
      NotEnoughWhiteMarblesException - when the map does not contains enough marbles
      InvalidLeaderAction - when the card does not have this ability
